ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Whats up with kill stealing????
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe, Usually if I m getting slammed I ll leave the kills and save my ass! I don t mind too much then but when I just walk up to a couple of wasps and kill
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe, Usually if I'm getting slammed I'll leave the kills and save my
ass! I don't mind too much then but when I just walk up to a couple of
wasps and kill them and one dissapears while I'm looting the other,
thatÂ’s what really gets me.
Sitting on a corpse! Man it's players like that who make me want to
create a bad-ass PK and just hunt them down at times!

C-ya!
Steve

-----Original Message-----
Date: Tue, 24 Jul 2001 19:04:04 +1000
From: "Su" <suceress@...>
Subject: Re: Whats up with kill stealing????


Maybe they think they are helping you by taking off some of the mobs so
you
don't get killed?
Man, I remember when I once had some lower lvl follow me around and try
to
loot everything I killed. He even sat on one of the corpses so I
couldn't
loot it. I had to threaten to petition his ass for him to go away.
luv,
-Su
